advancements.weaponmod.icicle.title: §bBone-Chilling Cold§r
advancements.weaponmod.icicle.descriptio: §bAcquire a spear of cold incarnate. Please wear gloves.§b
advancements.weaponmod.snowdrop.title: §bOut of the Blue§r
advancements.weaponmod.snowdrop.descript: §bAkin a sudden snowdrop our relationship was forged. Only six months, but in such short time we managed to become ever-so-closer, tending to each other's scars and fears. And, I hope we will continue to turn it into something even more beautiful. I love you§o§r
§8Fly like a Butterfly, sting like a Bee!§r
§8Acquire a throwing feather. Make sure to count your fingers after holding it.§r
advancements.weaponmod.sharp_irony.title: §8Dangerously Sexy§r
advancements.weaponmod.sharp_irony.descr: §8Acquire a lethally alluring fan. ...Yet still not nearly as alluring as you.§r
